name: Fulcrum Frenzy
description:
Fulcrum Frenzy is a simple game where you must maintain balance on your fulcrum while shooting at enemies that are swarming towards you. This game was made in 72 hours for the Score Space Jam #8. Feel free to leave your high-scores in the comments below! Just to note I am aware that initially the game pacing is very slow, and I wish I could go back and change that. Also, if you are on a device without a 16:9 aspect ratio (like most Macs), press the grayed-out fullscreen button to enter fullscreen. Otherwise hit the blue one.

Highest Score Known - 5272 by me

DM me: BenBonk#8753 on discord if you have a higher score and I will update it!

Programming and Art - BenBonk
